recipesJson.name: Jet's Custardo
recipesJson.author: JETVAPE
recipesJson.description:
I've been on a major vanilla custard kick since I started DIY. I'm a huge fan of custard, really really love a custard vape and have tried tons of different recipes that are posted on several sites, I enjoyed lots of them. I finally came up with a custard recipe that I've been playing around for quite a while. 
You guys should really really try this one it's that good (IMO), I'm in love with it.This is my absolute all time favorite vanilla custard recipe that I can vape all day without getting bored. I wanted to share this recipe to all of you custard lover, I promise you won't regret for trying out this recipe. Hope you guys Enjoy!

reviews.text: after a 7 day steep this stuff is nice !!! good if you don't want to wait 2 weeks plus for a custard. Nice Job with this !

I gave this a 5 week steep before I tried it.  I made a 30ml and its about half way gone in a day.  Very solid recipe and when it comes to Vanilla Custards I'm pretty snobby about whats "good" and whats "great".  This one is much closer to great 4.8 stars rounded up.  Simply Delicious.  Thanks for posting!!

This stuff is a LONG steeper!!! That being said, I guess that goes for most really good custard vapes... My batch of 60mls took a good month+ to come into it's own.. Went thru almost half of it on testing to see if it was ready, and I almost threw it out and have up on it a good 3+ times as well.. But I can say that the last 30mls have been great! üòÅüëçüëç Nice thick smooth vanilla custard! Way to go!
